title: In-game Messaging
body: Ok, so Every game I play, if somebody messages me, It says this person is not on your friend's list but they are. I was even in a game with my friend and he messaged me and I couldn't messaged him back because of this bug. Please help?

replies.body:
Are you launching League using the *Beta Client* or the Legacy Client? If it's the Beta Client, I'd like you to launch into League using the Legacy Client to see if anything changes:

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/article_attachments/215576628/Launch-Legacy-Client.jpg

Let me know what happens.
I'm not sure if the problem was fixed by you guys but it's fixed now. Thanks for helping
